case.name: Fortron Automotive Treatments Pty Ltd v Jones [2006] FCA 1239 (14 September 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: summary dismissal of proceedings against certain respondents
application of s 31a of the federal court of australia act
inapplicability to applications to strike out parts of pleadings
affidavit of respondents denying relevant knowledge
affidavit material insufficient to demonstrate no reasonable prospect of success

citances.sentence: The detail of Fortron's allegations are set out in the judgment delivered on 14 September 2006 in relation to its application for leave to serve Gammar out of the jurisdiction in Thailand --- Fortron Automotive Treatments Pty Ltd v Jones [2006] FCA 1239.
